data.text: Go Mndewa Imulungu, nokutogola siku zose,
Niye nodeng'helela mbuli ya Mndewa Imulungu,
Mtogoleni Mndewa Imulungu hamoja na niye,
Nimpula Mndewa Imulungu na heyo kanidika,
Wanhu omuhindukila Imulungu odeng'helela,
Mkiwa kamulilila Mndewa Imulungu na heyo kamuhulika,
Msenga wa Mndewa Imulungu kowakaliza iwanhu wose omdumba Imulungu,
Gezeni mulole Mndewa Imulungu viyanogile.
Mdumbeni Mndewa Imulungu mweye iwanhu zake wang'alile,
Wana simba oswela kinhu na okona nzala,
Izoni mweye iwana munitegeleze,
Vino kolonda kudeng'helela ugima,
Avo, leka kulonga gehile,
Leka gehile, utende ganogile,
Mndewa Imulungu kowalola iwanhu wanogile,
lakini kowalema iwanhu otenda gehile,
Iwanhu wanogile wahamulilila Mndewa Imulungu, heyo kowategeleza,
Mndewa Imulungu kabehi na iwanhu wali na lusikisiki,
Magazo ga imunhu yanogile mengi,
Kolukaliza lukuli lwake lose,
Gehile gomkoma imunhu yotenda gehile,
Mndewa Imulungu kouhonya ugima wa wasang'hanaji wake,
